name: Hercules (itch) (DimosAdonis)
description:
This is HERCULES. I created this game working alone for over a year. It is a 2-D sandbox role-playing game focusing on the 12 labours of Hercules. There are 13 main quests and over 15 side quests.

In this game you can: 

-fight hordes of monsters, outlaws and malignant humanoids (30 types of enemies) including Centaurs, Dragons, Satyrs, Hoplites, Giants, etc.

-Complete the 12 labours of Hercules.

-Harvest potions and poisons, wood to repair bridges and buffs to upgrade your heroes.

-Recruit many companions/ party members (ex. Iolaos, Diianeira, Likymnios, Phileus etc).

-Explore southern Greece, dark caves and exotic islands (ex. Labyrinth of Knossos, cave of the Mainads, garden of the Hesperids).

-Set the weather according to your will.

-Build the pillars of Hercules across southern Greece (each pillar is an altar dedicated to 1 of the Olympian gods. There are 14 pillars and a reward awaits the one to build all of the altars!)

-Read books and complete knowledge quizzes.

-Help friends or some "damsels in distress" with their objectives (ex. Theseus, Diianeira, Hypsepyle, etc)

-something I forgot.

Over 4 hours of gameplay.

Original OST

The orphic hymn to Hercules - Dimos-Adonis Vryzas

MAP

Play using the keyboard or a controller.
